text: Zbigniew Zaleski (29 April 1947 â€“ 31 September 2019) was a Polish politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for the Lublin Voivodship from 2004 through 2009 and again from 2013 through 2014. He was a member of the Civic Platform. He was born in Rogoziniec, Poland. Zaleski died on 31 September 2019 in Warsaw at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:MEPs for Poland
title: Zbigniew Zaleski
